title: The Carriage Master
description: "The Carriage Master is a wild ride with the masked vigilante we didn’t know we needed. Darkly funny. Unexpected and weird in the best possible way."A ruthless gang. A corrupt government. A detective in search of the truth.A town where nothing is what it seems.Alex Wagner didn’t come to Hampton looking for trouble—but it sure as hell found him the day he crossed paths with Randy.Randy isn’t your ordinary vigilante. He’s a lethally trained ex-intelligence operative on a mission from God—that is, according to him, anyway. By day, he goes undercover as a drifter in threadbare disguise. By night, he lurks in Hampton’s shadows, pursuing his own warped version of justice.Randy and his ragtag crew of misfits from the homeless encampment might be Alex’s only hope against the mysterious criminals who are hunting him down. But as Alex delves deeper into Hampton’s underworld, one thing becomes clear—there’s more to Randy and his mission than Alex could have imagined.What is Randy really fighting for—and how far down the rabbit hole will Alex go before the truth consumes them both?
author: Jake   Hayes
